text: Ronald Herbert Smith (25 November 1929 – September 2010) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Harrogate Railway Athletic. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Sportspeople from York Category:2010 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Harrogate Railway Athletic F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ron Smith (footballer, born 1929)
